bug.author: cemkod
bug.description: There are multiple references to Saver class in api_docs/python/train.md and tutorials/mnist/tf/index.md, yet the documentation for the Saver class does not exist. Is there any way I can help with the documentation?

comments.comment: Hm, our doc links are sort of broken on the tensorflow.org website. We'll fix it, but in the meantime: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/api_docs/python/state_ops.md#Saver>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/api_docs/python/state_ops.md#Saver</denchmark-link>
